body:
now what i'm doing is running different iteration by animating one slider  the problem is "read annual results component" needs to ran twice for each simulation run 

each time i do it the component gives me a fatal error and creates the lighting schedules as if there is no lighting analysis input to it and when rerun"read annual results component" again i have the lighting analysis integrated as needed from the beginning   ANY IDEAS why this could be happening   regards anas
